# Spread & Rest `...` ðŸ§‚

## Spread
Expands array/object properties.
```javascript
const arr1 = [1, 2];
const arr2 = [...arr1, 3, 4]; // [1, 2, 3, 4]
```

## Rest
Commences remaining arguments into an array.
```javascript
function sum(...numbers) {
  return numbers.reduce((a, b) => a + b);
}
```
